""SELECT [c].[Id], [c].[CategoryId], [c].[Content], [c].[DateCreated], [c].[DateModified], [c].[Description], [c].[HomeFlag], [c].[HotFlag], [c].[Name], [c].[OriginalPrice], [c].[Price], [c].[PromotionPrice], [c].[SeoAlias], [c].[SeoDescription], [c].[SeoKeywords], [c].[SeoPageTitle], [c].[Status], [c].[Tag], [c].[ThumbnailImage], [c].[Unit], [c].[ViewCount], [c.ProductCategory].[Id], [c.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [c.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [c.ProductCategory].[Description], [c.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag], [c.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [c.ProductCategory].[Image], [c.ProductCategory].[Name], [c.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [c.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [c.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [c.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [c.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [c.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [c.ProductCategory].[Status]
FROM [Products] AS [c]
